dc_title_s: Suite de la carte de l'Inde en deçaè du Gange : IIe. feuille, comprenant la Presqu' Isle de l'Inde : pour servir aè l'Histoire geáneárale des voyages.
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:9,000,000. Covers India north to Bombay. Also covers Sri Lanka. Relief shown pictorially. From: Histoire geáneárale des voyages ... Paris : Didot, 1746-1789."No. 2 Tome X in 4° Page 1"--Lower left margin."Tome 5 in 8° Page 116 No. 2"--Lower right margin. Includes decorative cartouche. Dimensions: 21 x 24 centimeters
